attributes.action: Stop the murder of our youths in London and elsewhere.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: There are other similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=knife+crime&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=south+africa&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
